game.name: Strawberry Angel Dessert
game.description:
Strawberries are one of the most loved fruits. Coming with several delicious flavors, they are a kind of sweet and a bit tart. Many people also use them in so many desserts with the help of their creative side. In this free online cooking game, you will get a chance to make an extremely tasty strawberry angel dessert that you will definitely appreciate. Are you ready to accept this challenge and prepare this scrumptious dessert with strawberries? Follow the instructions and indications properly to achieve the goal of this brand new cooking game.

Start it with crumbling some cake sponge with the help of a blender. Take a bowl and mix some cheese, cream and sugar into it. In order to obtain a sweet creamy texturized mixture, you will have to blend the crumbles and the cheese cream with each other. Take a nice serving bowl and put this mixture into it. Now on top of it add some fresh strawberries. Give them some more tasty flavour and sweetness with the help of strawberry puree. Use some whipped cream for topping. 

In order to decorate this extremely scrumptious dessert, use a bit more whipped cream. Complete the recipe with a single strawberry on the top of the recipe. make sure that you pay attention to the needful details to ensure the higher score in the end of this free online cooking game for girls and boys. Learn this excellent fun dessert recipe in our virtual kitchen, try it in your real kitchen and share it with your friends and family. Good luck girls! Have a blast today!
